pr_title: encoder: Add rot13 example script & SHA256 Predefined

timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+// This ROT13 example only handles upper and lower case A to Z (no numbers, punctuation, or extended chars)
+var EncodeDecodeResult = Java.type("org.zaproxy.addon.encoder.processors.EncodeDecodeResult");
+
+/**
+ * Process the input value and return the encoded/decoded/hashed etc. value
+ *
+ * Use EncodeDecodeResult.withError("Error Description") to provide an error description
+ * inside the result view
+ *
+ * @param {String} value - The input value
+ * @returns {EncodeDecodeResult} - The value that was encoded/decoded/hashed etc.
+ */

timeline.message:
encoder: Add rot13 example script & SHA256 Predefined

- Added a ROT13 example script.
- Added a SHA256 predefined processor.

Part of: zaproxy/zaproxy#5996

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
